channel.title: CVE Feed for SourceCodester -- Simple Parking Management System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SourceCodester -- Simple Parking Management System

item.title: CVE-2022-2364|2024-08-03T00:32:09.543Z -- sourcecodester -- simple%20parking%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found in SourceCodester Simple Parking Management System 1.0. This affects an unknown part of the file /ci_spms/admin/category. The manipulation of the argument vehicle_type with the input "><script>alert("XSS")</script> leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

item.title: CVE-2022-2363|2024-08-03T00:32:09.620Z -- sourcecodester -- simple%20parking%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found in SourceCodester Simple Parking Management System 1.0. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /ci_spms/admin/search/searching/. The manipulation of the argument search with the input "><script>alert("XSS")</script> leads to cross site scripting. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
